welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rio de Janeiro, a city known for its vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and lively atmosphere. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all the charm this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santos Dumont Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Santos Dumont Airport, serving regional and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated to international flights, with modern facilities and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal, handling mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
